question: A museum near your home is looking for people to do part-time voluntary/ unpaid work. You would like to do some voluntary/unpaid work at the museum.Write a letter to the museum director to apply for the voluntary/unpaid work. In your letter:* explain why you want to do voluntary/unpaid work at the museum* describe some skills and qualities you have that would be useful* give details of when you would be available for work
text: I am excited to see an advert in today's newspaper regarding voluntary work in your museum. The reason why I am keen to volunteer is that I have been thinking for a long time to contribute some of my leisure time to public service.

In addition to my interest in this type of work, I have a past experience of attending unpaid work in a local library as well as charity work in an old age home. Furthermore, I am a very tidy person which might help to keep valuable things in the right place and position. I would believe myself the best fit for providing service at the museum.
Moreover, I am a working software professional and I am engaged all weekdays. Hence I will be available to take up voluntary activities only at weekends or on predefined holidays.
Kindly keep me posted with your opinion and schedule to make myself available.
